item.description:
Shepard Fairey @ The Institute of Contemporary Arts

SHEPARD FAIREY: SUPPLY & DEMAND

Come and join me and others to see Shepard's exhibition before it leaves Boston This Weekend. Afterward, let's walk over to Drink for drinks.

Drink
www.drinkfortpoint.com

348 Congress St # 101
Boston, MA 02210-1236
(617) 695-1806

Hope to see you there!

Cheers,
Mike

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Joint Event: Shepard Fairey's Art Exhibition is Coming To A Close @ ICA Boston
